verse: 1 This Psalm containeth the commendation of brotherly amity among the servants of God.
Behold, how good and how comely a thing it is, brethren to dwell even together.
It is like to the precious ointment upon the head, that runneth down upon the beard, even unto Aaronâ€™s beard, which went down on the border of his garments,
And as the dew of Hermon which falleth upon the mountains of Zion: for there the Lord appointed the blessing and life forever.
